meanings.definition: A rich, sweet pastry made of layers of filo pastry filled with chopped nuts and sweetened with syrup or honey.
meanings.sent1: I enjoyed a delicious baklavas for dessert last night.
meanings.sent2: The bakery down the street sells the best baklavas in town.
meanings.sent3: At the party, everyone fought over the last piece of baklavas.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as sweet as a baklavas, brightening up the room.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of freshly baked baklavas filled the kitchen, tempting everyone.
